name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
summary_text: A remake of the 1951 classic science fiction film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

name: Jericho
summary_text: A small town in Kansas is literally left in the dark after seeing a mushroom cloud over near-by Denver, Colorado. The townspeople struggle to find answers about the blast and solutions on how to survive.

name: Darling in the Franxx
summary_text: In a future world where humanity has been driven to endangerment by giant beasts, a strike force is assembled to destroy the monsters and save the world.

name: Hitman: Agent 47
summary_text: An assassin teams up with a woman to help her find her father and uncover the mysteries of her ancestry.

name: Boys from County Hell
summary_text: A crew of hardy road workers, led by a bickering Father and Son, must survive the night when they accidentally awaken an ancient Irish vampire.

name: Cable Girls
summary_text: Set in the 1920s, this is the story of four women from different backgrounds newly hired as operators for a phone company.

name: Dinosaurs
summary_text: This show follows the life of a family of dinosaurs, living in a modern world. They have televisions, refrigerators, et cetera. The only humans around are cavemen, who are viewed as pets and wild animals.

name: The Searchers
summary_text: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches.

name: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey
summary_text: A fun-loving American bulldog pup, a hilarious Himalayan cat, and a wise old golden retriever embark on a long trek through the rugged wilderness of the Sierra Nevada mountains in a quest to reach home and their beloved owners.

name: Night Hunter
summary_text: A weathered Lieutenant, his police force, and a local vigilante are all caught up in a dangerous scheme involving a recently arrested, troubled man who's linked to years of female abductions and murders.

name: Justice League Dark: Apokolips War
summary_text: A Sequel to Justice League Dark (2017) involving Jack Kirby's New Gods.

name: Mr. Right
summary_text: A girl falls for the "perfect" guy, who happens to have a very fatal flaw: he's a hitman on the run from the crime cartels who employ him.

name: The Untamed
summary_text: Two talented disciples of respectable magical clans unit during the cultivation training and through many hardships they are together.

name: The AristoCats
summary_text: With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.

name: Jarhead
summary_text: A psychological study of a soldier's state of mind during the Gulf War. Told through the eyes of a U.S. Marine sniper who struggles to cope with boredom, a sense of isolation, and other issues back home.

name: Kiki's Delivery Service
summary_text: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

name: According to Jim
summary_text: A television show centered around a macho everyman, his loving wife, and their three precocious children.

name: Dennis the Menace
summary_text: When his parents have to go out of town, Dennis stays with Mr. and Mrs. Wilson. The little menace is driving Mr. Wilson crazy, but Dennis is just trying to be helpful. Even to the thief who's arrived in town.

name: Nevada Smith
summary_text: A half-American Indian and half-white teenager evolves into a hardened killer as he tracks down his parents' murderers.

name: Small Town Crime
summary_text: An alcoholic ex cop finds a woman on the roadside, left for dead. He offers to find the killer pro bono as P.I. Her granddad hires him. Things get nasty.

name: Bad Education
summary_text: The beloved superintendent of New York's Roslyn school district and his staff, friends and relatives become the prime suspects in the unfolding of the single largest public school embezzlement scandal in American history.

name: Maverick
summary_text: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

name: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
summary_text: On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.

name: Better Off Dead...
summary_text: After his girlfriend ditches him for a boorish ski jock, Lane decides that suicide is the only answer. However, his increasingly inept attempts bring him only more agony and embarrassment. Filled with the wildest teen nightmares.

name: Takers
summary_text: A group of bank robbers find their multi-million dollar plan interrupted by a hard-boiled detective.

name: The White Princess
summary_text: Based on the Philippa Gregory book of the same name, the story of Elizabeth of York, the White Queen's daughter, and her marriage to the Lancaster victor, Henry VII.

name: Love & Basketball
summary_text: Monica and Quincy love and play basketball together through many life challenges from childhood to adulthood.

name: Touched by an Angel
summary_text: Monica (Roma Downey), Tess (Della Reese), and Andrew (John Dye) are a trio of angels sent to Earth to tell depressed and troubled people that God loves them and hasn't forgotten them.

name: War
summary_text: An FBI Agent seeks vengeance on a mysterious assassin known as "Rogue" who murdered his partner.

name: Something's Gotta Give
summary_text: A swinger on the cusp of being a senior citizen with a taste for young women falls in love with an accomplished woman closer to his age.

name: Mine
summary_text: Encaged in a gold-clad life of secrets and lies, two women in a conglomerate family seek to topple all that stands in their way of finding true joy.

name: The Gods Must Be Crazy
summary_text: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

name: Bedazzled
summary_text: Hopeless dweeb Elliot Richards is granted seven wishes by the Devil to snare Allison, the girl of his dreams, in exchange for his soul.

name: The Kissing Booth 3
summary_text: It's the summer before Elle Evans is set to head off to college, and she has a big decision to make.

name: Below Deck Sailing Yacht
summary_text: Capt. Glenn Shephard and his crew set sail in a luxury sailing yacht to explore the crystal-clear blue waters of the Ionian Sea. The physicality of working on a sailing yacht brings new ...                See full summary »

name: Chappie
summary_text: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.

name: Radioactive
summary_text: The incredible true story of Marie Sklodowska-Curie and her Nobel Prize-winning work that changed the world.

name: The Debt
summary_text: In 1965, three Mossad Agents cross into East Berlin to apprehend a notorious Nazi war criminal. Thirty years later, the secrets the Agents share come back to haunt them.

name: The Sandhamn Murders
summary_text: Viveca Sten's popular novels come to life in "The Sandhamn Murders", a perfect mix of Nordic crime and the beautiful surroundings of the outer Stockholm archipelago.

name: Scary Movie 3
summary_text: Cindy must investigate mysterious crop circles and video tapes, and help the President in preventing an alien invasion.

name: Southland
summary_text: The lives of Police Officers working for the Los Angeles Police Department.

name: My Wife and Kids
summary_text: Michael Kyle longs for a traditional life, but his day-trader wife Janet, gangsta rap-worshipping son Michael Jr., and brooding daughters Claire and Kady make his dream just that ... a dream.

name: Young Guns of Texas
summary_text: A cowboy and 5 others pursue outlaws to recover stolen Union Army gold, while a revengeful rancher is it out to murder one of the pursuers.

name: Fawlty Towers
summary_text: Hotel owner Basil Fawlty's incompetence, short fuse, and arrogance form a combination that ensures accidents and trouble are never far away.

name: To Catch a Spy
summary_text: When the newly renovated Hotel Optima in Malta has a grand reopening, Chloe and her team from Destination Traveler Magazine, head over to cover the travel scene in Malta and sees someone fall to their death, right past her hotel window.

name: Holey Moley
summary_text: Contestants put their miniature golf-and physical-skills to the test as they face off in out-of-this-world challenges on a supersized course.

name: The Deep
summary_text: In Bermuda, two amateur treasure-hunting divers have a run-in with local criminals when they inadvertently discover the secret cargo of a World War II shipwreck.

name: The Night Comes for Us
summary_text: Ito, a gangland enforcer, caught amidst a treacherous and violent insurrection within his Triad crime family upon his return home from a stint abroad.

name: Badlands
summary_text: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town and her older greaser boyfriend embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota badlands.

name: Too Old to Die Young
summary_text: Detective Martin Jones, who leads a double life as a killer for hire in Los Angeles' deadly underground, suffers an existential crisis which leads him deeper into a blood splattered world of violence.

name: Corpse Bride
summary_text: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

name: The Call
summary_text: When a veteran 911 operator takes a life-altering call from a teenage girl who has just been abducted, she realizes that she must confront a killer from her past in order to save the girl's life.

name: Bandidas
summary_text: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.

name: Hairspray
summary_text: A 'pleasantly plump' teenager teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

name: Unauthorized Living
summary_text: Nemo Bandeira, a dealer with a clean businessman facade, is diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease and tries to keep it from his family while he starts to think about who might be his successor.

name: Thoroughbreds
summary_text: Two upper-class teenage girls in suburban Connecticut rekindle their unlikely friendship after years of growing apart. Together, they hatch a plan to solve both of their problems-no matter what the cost.
A post-apocalyptic thriller set in near-future Brazil, where a select few are allowed to join a privileged society after undergoing an intense and competitive process.

name: The Tragedy of Macbeth
summary_text: A Scottish lord becomes convinced by a trio of witches that he will become the next King of Scotland, and his ambitious wife supports him in his plans of seizing power.

name: The Peacemaker
summary_text: A US Army colonel and a civilian woman supervising him must track down stolen Russian nuclear weapons before they're used by terrorists.

name: The Swimming Pool
summary_text: Lovers Marianne and Jean-Paul spend their vacation in a villa on the French Riviera near St-Tropez. Marianne invites her former lover, Harry, and his teenage daughter to stay. Tension rises between them, especially when Jean-Paul seduces Penelope.

name: Shaft
summary_text: JJ Shaft, a cyber security expert with a degree from MIT, enlists his family's help to uncover the truth behind his best friend's untimely death.

name: Wolf Creek
summary_text: Three backpackers stranded in the Australian outback are plunged inside a hellish nightmare of insufferable torture by a sadistic psychopathic local.

name: Everybody Hates Chris
summary_text: A young African-American teen attempts to survive with his dysfunctional family and his all-white school in the 1980s.

name: Jersey Shore Family Vacation
summary_text: Past members of the cast of "Jersey Shore" reunite to live together and go on vacation in Miami and other destinations.

name: RoboCop 2
summary_text: Cyborg law enforcer RoboCop returns to protect the citizens of old Detroit but faces a deadly challenge when a rogue OCP member secretly creates a new, evil RoboCop 2.

name: The Last Stand
summary_text: The leader of a drug cartel busts out of a courthouse and speeds to the Mexican border, where the only thing in his path is a sheriff and his inexperienced staff.

name: Creep
summary_text: A young videographer answers an online ad for a one-day job in a remote town to record the last messages of a dying man. When he notices the man's odd behavior, he starts to question his intentions.

name: Never Rarely Sometimes Always
summary_text: A pair of teenage girls in rural Pennsylvania travel to New York City to seek out medical help after an unintended pregnancy.

name: Creamerie
summary_text: In the not too distant future, a viral plague has swept the earth. In a matter of weeks, it decimated 99% of men. The 1% were sent to The Facility in New Zealand but didn't survive. Or did they?

name: Ryan's Hope
summary_text: The trials and tribulations of The Ryans, an Irish-American family in New York City.

name: Blonde
summary_text: A fictionalized chronicle of the inner life of Marilyn Monroe.

name: Blockers
summary_text: Three parents try to stop their daughters from losing their virginity on prom night.

name: Mudbound
summary_text: Two men return home from World War II to work on a farm in rural Mississippi, where they struggle to deal with racism and adjusting to life after war.

name: The Fairly OddParents
summary_text: After being tortured and humiliated by his babysitter, a ten year old boy is put under the care of two fairy godparents, who can grant him almost any wish, which leads to dire consequences.

name: Tales of the Unexpected
summary_text: Dramatizations of many Roald Dahl short stories.

name: Pleasantville
summary_text: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom, where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

name: Ran
summary_text: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

name: The Wild Wild West
summary_text: Two Secret Service Agents, equipped with a wide array of gizmos, work for the government in the Old West.

name: The Guardian
summary_text: A high school swim champion with a troubled past enrolls in the U.S. Coast Guard's "A" School, where legendary rescue swimmer Ben Randall teaches him some hard lessons about loss, love, and self-sacrifice.

name: Resident Evil: Afterlife
summary_text: While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors living in a prison surrounded by the infected who also want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arcadia.

name: Electric Dreams
summary_text: A sci-fi anthology series with stand-alone episodes based on the works of Philip K. Dick.

name: Judge Dredd
summary_text: In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.

name: Vikingane
summary_text: Viking life at the close of the 8th century.

name: The Layover
summary_text: Two friends on a road trip compete for the affections of a handsome man when their flight is redirected due to a hurricane.

name: Non-Stop
summary_text: An air marshal springs into action during a transatlantic flight after receiving a series of text messages demanding $150 million into an off-shore account, or someone will die every 20 minutes.

name: Dude, Where's My Car?
summary_text: Two potheads wake up after a night of partying and cannot remember where they parked their car.

name: Poseidon
summary_text: On New Year's Eve, the luxury ocean liner Poseidon capsizes after being swamped by a rogue wave. The survivors are left to fight for their lives as they attempt to escape the sinking ship.

name: Ed Wood
summary_text: Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams, despite his lack of talent.

name: Vegas Vacation
summary_text: In the fourth outing for the vacation franchise, the Griswolds have to survive Vegas fever when they go to Las Vegas for a fun family vacation.

name: Never Been Kissed
summary_text: A newspaper reporter enrolls in high school as part of research for a story.

name: The Outer Limits
summary_text: A modern revival of the classic science fiction horror anthology show The Outer Limits (1963). Episodes often have twist-endings and involve aliens. Sometimes, a story from one episode continues in a later episode.

name: My So-Called Life
summary_text: A 15-year-old girl and her trials and tribulations of being a teenager and dealing with friends, guys, parents, and school.

name: Keeping Up Appearances
summary_text: A snobbish housewife is determined to climb the social ladder, in spite of her family's working class connections and the constant chagrin of her long suffering husband.

name: Footloose
summary_text: City teenager Ren MacCormack moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

name: The Emoji Movie
summary_text: Gene, a multi-expressional emoji, sets out on a journey to become a normal emoji.

name: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
summary_text: Now settled in Genovia, Princess Mia faces a new revelation: she is being primed for an arranged marriage to an English suitor.

name: Silverado
summary_text: A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

name: Moonlighting
summary_text: The quirky cases of a former model and a smart aleck detective who manage a private detective agency.

name: Good Times
summary_text: A poor family make the best of things in the Chicago housing projects.

name: The BFG
summary_text: An orphan little girl befriends a benevolent giant who takes her to Giant Country, where they attempt to stop the man-eating giants that are invading the human world.

name: Straw Dogs
summary_text: A young American and his English wife come to rural England and face increasingly vicious local harassment.

name: Hotel Mumbai
summary_text: The true story of the Taj Hotel terrorist attack in Mumbai. Hotel staff risk their lives to keep everyone safe as people make unthinkable sacrifices to protect themselves and their families.

name: Fortitude
summary_text: Perched on the edge of the Arctic Circle, Fortitude is one of the safest towns on earth. There has never been a violent crime here. Until now.

name: Summer of 84
summary_text: After suspecting that their police officer neighbor is a serial killer, a group of teenage friends spend their summer spying on him and gathering evidence, but as they get closer to discovering the truth, things get dangerous.

name: Everybody Wants Some!!
summary_text: In 1980, a group of college baseball players navigate their way through the freedoms and responsibilities of unsupervised adulthood.

name: The Six Million Dollar Man
summary_text: After a severely injured test pilot is rebuilt with nuclear-powered bionic limbs and implants, he serves as an intelligence agent.

name: The Jackal
summary_text: An imprisoned I.R.A. fighter is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.

name: On the Basis of Sex
summary_text: The true story of Ruth Bader Ginsburg, her struggles for equal rights, and the early cases of a historic career that lead to her nomination and confirmation as U.S. Supreme Court Associate Justice.

name: Picture of Beauty
summary_text: In an early 20th century village, a painter with an unusual commission finds two pretty girls to model for him. The girls slowly come of age while exploring their sexuality and finding liberation in a repressed society.

name: The Host
summary_text: A monster emerges from Seoul's Han River and begins attacking people. One victim's loving family does what it can to rescue her from its clutches.

name: Mallrats
summary_text: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

name: Andromeda
summary_text: Captain Dylan Hunt and the crew of the Andromeda Ascendant set out on a mission to rebuild the Systems Commonwealth 300 years after its fall.

name: The Hundred-Foot Journey
summary_text: The Kadam family leaves India for France where they open a restaurant directly across the road from Madame Mallory's Michelin-starred eatery.

name: Agent Cody Banks
summary_text: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.

name: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation
summary_text: A group of martial arts warriors have only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.

name: The High Note
summary_text: A superstar singer and her overworked personal assistant are presented with a choice that could alter the course of their respective careers.

name: Brother Bear
summary_text: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

name: Rookie Blue
summary_text: Andy McNally and her friends are out of the academy and must adjust to the challenging life of a police officer at the 15th Division in Toronto.

name: Bend It Like Beckham
summary_text: Two ambitious girls, despite their parents' wishes, have their hearts set on careers in professional soccer.

name: The Mist
summary_text: After an eerie mist rolls into a small town, the residents must battle the mysterious mist and its threats, fighting to maintain their morality and sanity.

name: A Little Chaos
summary_text: Two talented landscape artists become romantically entangled while building a garden in King Louis XIV's palace at Versailles.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
summary_text: In Night City, a mercenary known as V navigates a dystopian society in which the line between humanity and technology becomes blurred.

name: Ice Age: Continental Drift
summary_text: Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world.

name: The To Do List
summary_text: Feeling pressured to become more sexually experienced before she goes to college, Brandy Klark makes a list of things to accomplish before hitting campus in the fall.

name: Penguins of Madagascar
summary_text: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private join forces with undercover organization The North Wind to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine from destroying the world as we know it.

name: High Plains Drifter
summary_text: A gun-fighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

name: Speed Racer
summary_text: A young driver, Speed Racer, aspires to be champion of the racing world with the help of his family and his high-tech Mach 5 automobile.

name: What Lies Beneath
summary_text: The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind.

name: The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day
summary_text: The MacManus brothers are living a quiet life in Ireland with their father, but when they learn that their beloved priest has been killed by mob forces, they go back to Boston to bring justice to those responsible and avenge the priest.

name: Deep Rising
summary_text: A group of heavily armed hijackers board a luxury ocean liner in the South Pacific Ocean to loot it, only to do battle with a series of large-sized, tentacled, man-eating sea creatures who had already invaded the ship.

name: Hot Summer Nights
summary_text: In the summer of 1991, a sheltered teenage boy comes of age during a wild summer he spends on Cape Cod getting rich from selling pot to gangsters, falling in love for the first time, partying and eventually realizing that he is in over his head.

name: River's Edge
summary_text: A high school slacker commits a shocking act and proceeds to let his friends in on the secret. However, the friends' reaction is almost as ambiguous and perplexing as the crime itself.

name: P-Valley
summary_text: Follows the lives of strip club dancers working down in the Dirty Delta.

name: Good Luck Charlie
summary_text: The Duncan family are adjusting to the surprise birth of their fourth child, Charlie. When parents Amy and Bob return to work they put their latest addition in the care of her three older siblings.

name: Fool's Gold
summary_text: A new clue to the whereabouts of a lost treasure rekindles a married couple's sense of adventure -- and their estranged romance.

name: The Man with the Golden Gun
summary_text: James Bond is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin, while he attempts to recover sensitive solar cell technology that is being sold to the highest bidder.

name: A Single Man
summary_text: An English professor, one year after the sudden death of his boyfriend, is unable to cope with his typical days in 1960s Los Angeles.

name: DOA: Dead or Alive
summary_text: The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, an invitational martial arts contest. There, four female rival fighters will have to work together to uncover the secret that the organizer of the tournament is trying to hide.

name: Chucky
summary_text: After a vintage Chucky doll turns up at a suburban yard sale, an idyllic American town is thrown into chaos as a series of horrifying murders begin to expose the town's hypocrisies and secrets.

name: The Dead Zone
summary_text: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

name: Dance of the 41
summary_text: At the end of the 19th century, Ignacio de la Torre married the daughter of the president of Mexico, Porfirio Díaz. Ignacio leads a double life: he rises in the traditional world of politics while being a member of a clandestine society.

name: Over the Garden Wall
summary_text: Two brothers find themselves lost in a mysterious land and try to find their way home.

name: Scott & Bailey
summary_text: Two female detectives, one motherly, the other emotionally immature, have varying levels of success applying their eccentric outlooks on life to their police cases and private lives.

name: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic
summary_text: After learning that her friends, as well as herself, are the magical Elements of Harmony, studious unicorn Twilight Sparkle is sent by her mentor, Princess Celestia, to Ponyville to study the magic of friendship with help from her friends.

name: An American Pickle
summary_text: An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.

name: 8MM
summary_text: A private investigator is hired to discover if a "snuff film" is authentic or not.

name: Mike & Molly
summary_text: A couple meets at an Overeaters' Anonymous meeting.

name: A Haunted House
summary_text: Malcolm and Kisha move into their dream home, but soon learn a demon also resides there. When Kisha becomes possessed, Malcolm - determined to keep his sex life on track - turns to a priest, a psychic, and a team of ghost-busters for help.

name: Good Luck Chuck
summary_text: In order to keep the woman of his dreams from falling for another guy, Charlie Logan has to break the curse that has made him wildly popular with single women: Sleep with Charlie once, and the next man you meet will be your true love.

name: Urban Legend
summary_text: A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.

name: Mean Girls 2
summary_text: The Plastics are back in the long-awaited follow-up to the smash hit Mean Girls - and now the clique is more fashionable, funny, and ferocious than ever.

name: House on Haunted Hill
summary_text: An amusement park mogul offers a group of diverse people $1,000,000 to spend the night in a haunted house with a horrifying past.

name: Need for Speed
summary_text: Fresh from prison, a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate joins a cross-country race with revenge in mind. His ex-partner, learning of the plan, places a massive bounty on his head as the race begins.

name: Gold Digger
summary_text: A wealthy older woman falls in love with a younger man, but is the relationship all that it seems?

name: Youth
summary_text: A retired orchestra conductor is on vacation with his daughter and his film director best friend in the Alps when he receives an invitation from Queen Elizabeth II to perform for Prince Philip's birthday.

name: Rescue Dawn
summary_text: A U.S. fighter pilot's epic struggle of survival after being shot down on a mission over Laos during the Vietnam War.

name: Undekhi
summary_text: When a dead body is received, locals inform Dibyendu Bhattacharya, who is investigating the case, that the body is at least 2-3 days old. They also find out the body was murdered first and then eaten by animals.

name: To All the Boys: Always and Forever
summary_text: Senior year of high school takes center stage as Lara Jean returns from a family trip to Korea and considers her college plans - with and without Peter.

name: Clouds
summary_text: Young musician Zach Sobiech discovers his cancer has spread, leaving him just a few months to live. With limited time, he follows his dream and makes an album, unaware that it will soon be a viral music phenomenon.

name: Masterchef
summary_text: A nationwide search for the best home cooks in America. One of 50 hopefuls will become a culinary star and one of America's "Masterchefs."

name: Spies Like Us
summary_text: Two bumbling government employees think they are U.S. spies, only to discover that they are actually decoys for Nuclear War.

name: Breakdown
summary_text: A man searches for his missing wife after his car breaks down in the middle of the desert.

name: Ip Man
summary_text: During the Japanese invasion of China, a wealthy martial artist is forced to leave his home when his city is occupied. With little means of providing for themselves, Ip Man and the remaining members of the city must find a way to survive.

name: Gypsy
summary_text: Therapist Jean Holloway becomes too immersed in the lives of her patients.

name: M
summary_text: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

name: Girlfriends
summary_text: A look at the lives, loves, and losses of four different women, Toni, Maya, Lynn, and Joan.

name: Force of Nature
summary_text: A gang of thieves plan a heist during a hurricane and encounter trouble when a cop tries to force everyone in the building to evacuate.

name: Marley & Me
summary_text: A family learns important life lessons from their adorable, but naughty and neurotic dog.

name: What If
summary_text: Wallace, who is burned out from a string of failed relationships, forms an instant bond with Chantry, who lives with her longtime boyfriend. Together, they puzzle out what it means if your best friend is also the love of your life.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's
summary_text: Mike Schmidt decides to take on an easy job as a nighttime security guard at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. He prepares for five quiet nights by his desk, but the surveillance cameras pick up something unexpected.

name: Frankie Drake Mysteries
summary_text: The series follows Frankie Drake, a female private detective operating in Toronto in the 1920s.

name: Professor T.
summary_text: The eccentric but brilliant criminology professor Jasper Teerlinck is an advisor to the Belgian federal police in Antwerp. Although a valuable contributor, he drives everyone nuts because of his strange behavior.

name: Revolution
summary_text: Fifteen years after a permanent global blackout, a group of revolutionaries seeks to drive out an occupying force posing as the United States Government.

name: The Lake House
summary_text: A lonely doctor, who once occupied an unusual lakeside house, begins exchanging love letters with its former resident, a frustrated architect. They must try to unravel the mystery behind their extraordinary romance before it's too late.

name: Men of Honor
summary_text: The story of Carl Brashear, the first African-American U.S. Navy Diver, and the man who trained him.

name: I Love You, Man
summary_text: Friendless Peter Klaven goes on a series of man-dates to find a Best Man for his wedding. But, when his insta-bond with his new B.F.F. puts a strain on his relationship with his fiancée, can the trio learn to live happily ever after?

name: The Toxic Avenger
summary_text: A meek towel boy transforms into a powerful superhero after getting dumped into a vat of toxic waste.

name: The Poughkeepsie Tapes
summary_text: In an abandoned house in Poughkeepsie, New York murder investigators uncover hundreds of tapes showing decades of a serial killer's work.

name: Below Zero
summary_text: On a lonely road, a prison transport is brutally assaulted. Martin, the policeman who was driving, survives and fortifies his position while the con men search for a way to finish him.

name: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
summary_text: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

name: Fantasy Flirt
summary_text: A high energy mix of the newest and sexiest girls to pose for Playboy. Models share their turn-ons, fantasies and secret desires while taking it all off for the cameras.

name: Hotel Rwanda
summary_text: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

name: Capricorn One
summary_text: When the first manned flight to Mars is deemed unsafe and scrubbed on the launch pad, anxious authorities must scramble to save face and retain their funding - and so an unthinkable plot to fake the mission is hatched.

name: Paprika
summary_text: A young country girl comes to town and works in a brothel in order to help her fiance get the money to start his own business. "Paprika" is the name given to her by the madam.

name: Hidalgo
summary_text: In 1890, a down-and-out cowboy and his horse travel to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross desert horse race.

name: Hightown
summary_text: Set in the world of beautiful but bleak Cape Cod, one woman's journey to sobriety is overshadowed by a murder investigation dragging her into its fold.

name: Chasing Amy
summary_text: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.

name: Cool World
summary_text: When Jack Deebs was behind bars he found escape by creating Cool World, a cartoon series featuring a vixen named Holli Would. The flesh proves weaker than ink, however, as Holli takes human form in Las Vegas.

name: Just for the Summer
summary_text: English teacher Penelope Campbell loves her annual summer vacations visiting her Grandma Dot, despite Dot's constant attempts to set her up with every single man in town. This year, she ...                See full summary »

name: I Feel Pretty
summary_text: A woman struggling with insecurity wakes from a fall believing she is the most beautiful and capable woman on the planet. Her new confidence empowers her to live fearlessly, but what happens when she realizes her appearance never changed?

name: Alice Through the Looking Glass
summary_text: Alice returns to the whimsical world of Wonderland and travels back in time to help the Mad Hatter.

name: Machete Kills
summary_text: The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.

name: Naked
summary_text: An unemployed Mancunian vents his rage on unsuspecting strangers as he embarks on a nocturnal London odyssey.

name: Never Back Down 2: The Beatdown
summary_text: Four fighters with different backgrounds come together to train under an ex-MMA rising star and then ultimately have to fight each other.

name: The Endless
summary_text: As kids, they escaped a UFO death cult. Now, two adult brothers seek answers after an old videotape surfaces and brings them back to where they began.

name: The Watch
summary_text: Based on the characters from Terry Pratchett's Discworld novels, A group of misfit cops rise up from decades of helplessness to save their corrupt city from catastrophe.

name: The Accused
summary_text: After a young woman suffers a brutal gang rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.

name: Furiosa
summary_text: The origin story of renegade warrior Furiosa before she teamed up with Mad Max in 'Fury Road'

name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning
summary_text: Before being sent to serve in Vietnam, two brothers and their girlfriends take one last road trip, but when they get into an accident, a terrifying experience will take them to a secluded house of horrors, with a chainsaw-wielding killer.

name: The Man Who Would Be King
summary_text: Two British former soldiers decide to set themselves up as Kings in Kafiristan, a land where no white man has set foot since Alexander the Great.

name: Collective
summary_text: Director Alexander Nanau follows a crack team of investigators at the Romanian newspaper Gazeta Sporturilor as they try to uncover a vast health-care fraud that enriched moguls and politicians and led to the deaths of innocent citizens.

name: Jonah Hex
summary_text: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.

name: Rebecca
summary_text: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

name: Looking for Alaska
summary_text: A new arrival at a boarding school falls in love with a beguiling female student.

name: Æon Flux
summary_text: Aeon Flux is a mysterious assassin working for the Monicans, a group of rebels trying to overthrow the government. When she is sent on a mission to kill the Chairman, a whole new mystery is found.

name: Legend of the Seeker
summary_text: After the mysterious murder of his father, a son's search for answers begins a momentous fight against tyranny.

name: Before I Fall
summary_text: February 12 is just another day in Sam's charmed life, until it turns out to be her last. Stuck reliving her last day over and over, Sam untangles the mystery around her death and discovers everything she's losing.

name: Giri/Haji
summary_text: A detective from Tokyo scours London for his missing brother, who's been involved with the Yakuza and accused of murder.

name: Awkwafina Is Nora from Queens
summary_text: With help from her dad and grandmother, Nora Lum navigates young adulthood in Flushing, New York with her cousin.

name: Red Eye
summary_text: A woman is kidnapped by a stranger on a routine flight. Threatened by the potential murder of her father, she is pulled into a plot to assist her captor in a political assassination.

name: Two for the Money
summary_text: After suffering a career-ending knee injury, a former college football star aligns himself with one of the most renowned touts in the sports-gambling business.

name: Teen Titans Go!
summary_text: Superhero roommates Robin, Cyborg, Starfire, Raven and Beast Boy love saving the day, but what happens when they're done fighting crime?

name: Amores Perros
summary_text: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

name: Eli
summary_text: A boy receiving treatment for his auto-immune disorder discovers that the house he's living in isn't as safe as he thought.

name: For Your Eyes Only
summary_text: James Bond is assigned to find a missing British vessel, equipped with a weapons encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.

name: The Benchwarmers
summary_text: A trio of guys try and make up for missed opportunities in childhood by forming a three-player baseball team to compete against standard children's Little League squads.

name: Togo
summary_text: The story of Togo, the sled dog who led the 1925 serum run yet was considered by most to be too small and weak to lead such an intense race.

name: Evangelion: 3.0+1.0 Thrice Upon a Time
summary_text: Shinji Ikari is still adrift after losing his will to live, but the place he arrives at teaches him what it means to hope. Finally, the Instrumentality Project is set in motion and Wille ...                See full summary »

name: The Grudge
summary_text: An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.

name: Berlin Syndrome
summary_text: A passionate holiday romance leads to an obsessive relationship, when an Australian photojournalist wakes one morning in a Berlin apartment and is unable to leave.

name: Sarbath
summary_text: Kathir works as an IT professional at Dindigul and visited his village on a holiday in order to attend his elder brother's wedding but only to realise that the wedding has been cancelled. ...                See full summary »

name: Earth Girls Are Easy
summary_text: A Southern California girl befriends three furry aliens after their spaceship lands in her swimming pool.

name: Cradle 2 the Grave
summary_text: A jewel thief's daughter is kidnapped after he steals a collection of prized black diamonds, which aren't at all what they seem.

name: Coyote
summary_text: After 32 years of service, Border Patrol agent Ben Clemens finds himself helping people he has always tried to keep out of the United States.

name: The Quiet
summary_text: Following the unexpected death of her father, a deaf teenager moves in with her godparents, where she discovers the cruel behaviour of their daughter may be indicative of a dark secret within the family.

name: The Brothers Grimsby
summary_text: A new assignment forces a top spy to team up with his football hooligan brother.

name: Don't Listen
summary_text: Daniel and Sara have a 9-year-old son, Eric, and they've just moved to a new home not knowing the neighbours call it "the house of the voices". Eric is the first one to notice the odd noises behind each door.

name: Faster
summary_text: An ex-con gets on a series of apparently unrelated killings. He gets tracked by a veteran cop with secrets of his own and an egocentric hit man.

name: The Valhalla Murders
summary_text: Police profiler Arnar is sent back home from Oslo to his native Iceland to investigate the country's first serial killer case. He teams up with the local senior cop Kata.

name: Outpost
summary_text: In war-torn Eastern Europe, a mysterious businessman hires a group of mercenaries on a routine mission to protect him not knowing of the long-hidden secret that lies there.

name: The Possession
summary_text: A young girl buys an antique box at a yard sale, unaware that inside the collectible lives a malicious ancient spirit. The girl's father teams with his ex-wife to find a way to end the curse upon their child.

name: Slender Man
summary_text: In a small town in Massachusetts, a group of friends, fascinated by the internet lore of the Slender Man, attempt to prove that he doesn't actually exist - until one of them mysteriously goes missing.

name: A Serious Man
summary_text: Larry Gopnik, a Midwestern physics teacher, watches his life unravel over multiple sudden incidents. Though seeking meaning and answers amidst his turmoils, he seems to keep sinking.

name: Secret City
summary_text: Beneath the placid facade of Canberra, amidst rising tension between China and America, senior political journalist Harriet Dunkley uncovers a secret city of interlocked conspiracies, putting innocent lives in danger including her own.

name: Six Days Seven Nights
summary_text: Robin Monroe, a New York magazine editor, and the gruff pilot Quinn Harris must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island.

name: The House Across the Street
summary_text: Dave Joslin, the managing editor of a big-city newspaper, is demoted and moved to the Miss Lonely Hearts column-writing department by the newspaper's publisher, J. B. Grennell, because ...                See full summary »

name: Batman: The Killing Joke
summary_text: As Batman hunts for the escaped Joker, the Clown Prince of Crime attacks the Gordon family to prove a diabolical point mirroring his own fall into madness.

name: The Turning
summary_text: A young governess is hired to look after an orphaned girl, but the return of the girl's problematic brother uncovers secrets from their past. A modern take on Henry James' novella "The Turn of the Screw."

name: The Naked Director
summary_text: Follows the story of Toru Muranishi's unusual and dramatic life filled with big ambitions as well as spectacular setbacks in his attempt to turn Japan's porn industry on its head.

name: Private School
summary_text: Chris from a girls' boarding school loves Jim from a nearby boys' boarding school. Jordan also wants Jim and plays dirty. Jim and two friends visit the girls' school posing as girls.

name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
summary_text: Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series Shin seiki evangerion (1995).

name: Small Axe
summary_text: Small Axe is based on the real-life experiences of London's West Indian community and is set between 1969 and 1982.

name: The Laundromat
summary_text: A widow investigates an insurance fraud, chasing leads to a pair of Panama City law partners exploiting the world's financial system.

name: The Do-Over
summary_text: Two down-on-their-luck guys decide to fake their own deaths and start over with new identities, only to find the people they're pretending to be are in even deeper trouble.

name: Secret Diary of a Call Girl
summary_text: Based on the popular diary of the anonymous sex worker known only as Belle de Jour.

name: Lust, Caution
summary_text: During World War II era, a young woman, Wang Jiazhi, gets swept up in a dangerous game of emotional intrigue with a powerful political figure, Mr. Yee.

name: The Bachelorette
summary_text: A single bachelorette dates multiple men over several weeks, narrowing them down to hopefully find her true love.

name: The Loud House
summary_text: Lincoln Loud is an eleven-year-old boy who lives with ten sisters. With the help of his right-hand man Clyde, Lincoln finds new ways to survive in such a large family every day.

name: The Carrie Diaries
summary_text: Carrie Bradshaw is in her junior year of high school in the early 1980s. She asks her first questions about love, sex, friendship and family while navigating the worlds of high school and Manhattan.

name: The Incredible Hulk
summary_text: A fugitive scientist has the curse of becoming a powerful green monster under extreme emotional stress.
